name: Shadow Rebirth
description:
History
A dark evil spreads across the Hayabusa region. A clan of shadow ninjas, led by the fearsome Ryujin, advances, casting darkness over peaceful villages. Peace is threatened, and darkness spreads.

Embark on a journey to defeat Shadow Clan and restore peace to Hayabusa.

You control a young ninja named Takeshi.
• Face skilled ninjas and monsters.
• Explore the Hayabusa region.
• Discover dangerous dungeons.
• Protect other villages from ninjas.
• Defeat the shadow clan.
